column4: Can i "fake" a floppy/cd drive somehow? I'm deving a simple OS and i want to use a virtual floppy or cd instead of a real if its possible
I don't think there is any difference between a folder, cd, floppy in linux.. I could be wrong though
I need to be able to boot it in Bochs :P
ah.. can't bochs boot from an iso or something?
